header.title: Legal issues
header.abstract: This page contains an overview of the legal tasks and documents required by the project, first and foremost the text licensing contract to build a usable corpus.

body.p: We have decided to use the contracts from Helsinki university, and both the originals as well as our internal translations are available below, together with an example from the University of Oslo.
